trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch to a designer view (such as `Design` view in [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]), the markup that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control is parsed.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar para um modo de exibição designer (como `Design` exibir em [!INCLUDE[vs_current_short](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]), a marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle é analisado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: A design-time version of the control is then created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch to source view, the design-time control is persisted as markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar para exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é mantido como marcação para a página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the DataPagerDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns the list of items that are used to create a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe DataPagerDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna a lista de itens que são usados para criar um painel de marcas inteligentes.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PagedControlID%2A> property is used as the designer (shadowed) version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PagedControlID%2A>propriedade é usada como a versão (sombreada) designer o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PagedControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the templated pager fields of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>propriedade retorna uma coleção de grupos de modelo para os campos de pager modelado de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, which indicates that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control in order to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade sempre retorna `true`, que indica que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods of the DataPagerDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> methods return the HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos da classe DataPagerDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>métodos retornam a marcação HTML que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add or remove properties from the properties grid for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método é usado para adicionar ou remover propriedades da grade de propriedades para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of items that are used to create the smart tag panel for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de itens que são usados para criar o painel de marcas inteligentes para o associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The list of items that are used to create the smart tag panel for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A lista de itens que são usados para criar o painel de marcas inteligentes para o associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Generates the HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera a marcação HTML que é usada para renderizar associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection is not empty, the GetDesignTimeHtml method refreshes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object to force the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to be called and then calls its base implementation.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção não está vazia, o método GetDesignTimeHtml atualiza o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>objeto para forçar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método a ser chamado e, em seguida, chama sua implementação base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection is empty, the GetDesignTimeHtml method invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção estiver vazia, o método GetDesignTimeHtml invoca o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>método para gerar a marcação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataPagerDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A marcação HTML que é usada para renderizar associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Generates the HTML markup that represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time that has no visual representation at run time.
trans-unit.target: Gera a marcação HTML que representa um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle em tempo de design que não tem representação visual em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml method is used by the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control at design time if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml é usado pelo designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controlar em tempo de design se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção está vazia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29> method to create a placeholder that displays the type and the ID of the control, and additional instructions for the user.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29>método para criar um espaço reservado que exibe o tipo e a ID do controle e instruções adicionais para o usuário.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup that represents an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A marcação HTML que representa um vazio <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the control designer and loads the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer de controle e carrega o controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are required for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método Initialize e seus métodos base configurem propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle associado este designer, ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: The control being designed.
trans-unit.target: O controle que está sendo criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value for the designer version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor para a versão de designer do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Adds or removes properties from the property grid for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona ou remove propriedades da grade de propriedades para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method adds a new property to the property grid of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control that corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O método PreFilterProperties adiciona uma nova propriedade à grade de propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle que corresponde do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property is set to `true`, the PreFilterProperties method also sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `BrowsableAttribute.No`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>está definida como `true`, o método PreFilterProperties também define o <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>atributo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para `BrowsableAttribute.No`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This prevents pager fields from being deleted by using the `Fields` dialog box when a templated pager field is in template mode.
trans-unit.target: Isso impede que os campos de pager seja excluído usando o `Fields` caixa de diálogo quando um campo de pager de modelo está no modo de modelo.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the properties that are exposed in the property grid for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém as propriedades que são expostas na grade de propriedades para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the templated pager fields of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de grupos de modelos para os campos de pager modelado de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property creates a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objects that represent the template elements in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade TemplateGroups cria uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>objetos que representam os elementos de modelo em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: It adds one element to the collection for each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> collection of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: Ele adiciona um elemento à coleção para cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A>coleção de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField>

trans-unit.source: A collection of template groups for the templated pager fields of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de grupos de modelo para os campos de pager modelado de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy instead of the actual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"></xref> control that is associated with the designer in order to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez de real <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager"> </xref> controle que está associado com o designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.
